title: Not Earning fragments
body: I havent been earning my key fragments at all its been about over 25+ games and I haven't earned a single fragment ik they are RNG but Ive played so many games since my last key fragment {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: Zombiemaster's information is spot on.  Once the reset occurs, you'll find that your rate will increase drastically and continue to slow down again.  As suggested, our [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) will have more info on this!  Best of luck!

are there any plans to address the massive disparity between chests and keys? as it stands right now if you unlock chests whenever you're able, you will have anywhere from 14-18 chests right now and no keys to open them. this number is only going to get bigger as well. if i keep playing till next year i will have something like 40 chests and no way to open them. why not make keys and not chests purchasable with IP in the shop?

Whenever you earn a key fragment, the drop rate for the next one is lowered, and this continues to happen every time you earn one. The drop rate does reset approximately 30 days after you earn your first key fragment at the original drop rate.

Hope this helps. For more information about Hextech Crafting, you can check out this [guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide).
